page.title: 16AMENITIES
page.content: THE AREA OF OUR SURVEY CONTAINS NO AMENITIES. THE NEAREST SHOPS ARE THOSE FOUND IN THE OUTLYING DISTRICTS OF THE CITY OF DUNDEE , PARTICULARLY LARGE SUPERMARKETS . MOBILE SHOPS (BOTH BUTCHERS AND BAKERS) DO,HOWEVER,VISIT THE AREA AT LEAST ONCE A WEEK EACH. THERE WAS A POST OFFICE IN TEALING VILLAGE , BUT THIS CLOSED DOWN IN 1976 . A TWICE DAILY LIFT OF MAIL STILL OCCURS. THE ONLY BUS ROUTES NEARBY ARE THOSE WHICH OPERATE ON THE A929 ( DUNDEE TO FORFAR OR KIRRIEMUIR AND VICE VERSA). THE AREA'S POPULATION IS SERVED BY GENERAL PRACTITIONERS FROM FORFAR OR DUNDEE. THE NEAREST HOSPITAL FOR CASUALTY TREATMENT IS DUNDEE ROYAL INFIRMARY.A DISTRICT NURSING SERVICE IS OPERATED FROM ONE OF THE HEALTH CENTRES IN DUNDEE.
